alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 4:50PM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, mainly from the Niobrara valley northward, and a light glaze of ice. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Boyd and Holt Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 7 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures with wind chill values of zero to 5 below especially Tuesday night and Wednesday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
